item.title: 南非顶级银行首席执行官称投资者仍对南非经济反弹保持警惕
item.description: 近几个月来，南非的资产有所回升，但南非最大银行的负责人仍然认为，许多外国投资者仍持谨慎态度，他们在等待这个非洲大陆工业化程度最高的经济体兑现改革承诺。【原文：South African assets have rallied in recent months, yet the head of the country’s biggest bank still sees a cautious approach among many foreign investors who are waiting for the continent’s most industrialized economy to deliver on promised reforms.】

item.title: 中国经济学家建议出售 14 亿美元债券以刺激经济
item.description: 中国一位主要经济学家表示，中国可能会通过发行多达 10 万亿元人民币（合 1.4 万亿美元）的特别债务来加大对经济的财政支持，这反映出人们对中国政府扩大公共开支作为其经济刺激计划一部分的期望日益高涨。【原文：A leading economist in China said the country could ramp up fiscal support for the economy by issuing as much as 10 trillion yuan ($1.4 trillion) in special debt, reflecting rising expectations for Beijing to expand public spending as part of its stimulus package.】

item.title: 海湾能源和 Intouch 股票大涨，300 亿美元交易面临风险
item.description: 泰国亿万富翁萨拉特-拉塔纳瓦迪（Sarath Ratanavadi）的电力公司海湾能源开发公司（Gulf Energy Development Pcl）及其电信关联公司 Intouch 控股公司（Intouch Holdings Pcl）的股价飙升，可能会使这桩价值近 300 亿美元的合并案更加难以完成。【原文：A surge in the stock prices of Thai billionaire Sarath Ratanavadi’s power company Gulf Energy Development Pcl and its telecoms affiliate Intouch Holdings Pcl may make it more challenging for the almost $30 billion merger to get done.】

item.title: 印度放宽出口限制后大米创 16 年最大跌幅
item.description: 亚洲大米价格创下 16 年多来最大跌幅，原因是印度放宽部分出口限制后，市场对供应的担忧有所缓解。【原文：Rice prices tumbled the most in more than 16 years in Asia as concerns over supply eased after India relaxed some export restrictions.】

item.title: 石油期权显示市场因中东风险而进一步上涨
item.description: 石油期权显示，由于以色列和伊朗之间的敌对行动升级，能源基础设施或原油油轮成为攻击目标的风险上升，投资者押注油价将进一步上涨。【原文：Oil options show investors are betting prices will rise further as escalating hostilities between Israel and Iran raise the risk that energy infrastructure or crude tankers will be targeted.】

If history is any guide, the rally may have a long way to go, DataTrek Research says.】

item.title: 日元暴跌后日本股市有望反弹：市场综述
